title: The Offset Jim Interview: Coming Up in Oakland, Rich Off The Pack, Moving to NYC & More
description:
#OffsetJim talks about his upbringing, coming up in Oakland, taking music seriously couple years ago, relationship with AllBlack, #RichOffThePack and more!
https://www.instagram.com/1offsetjim/
https://twitter.com/Offset_jim
